review_text: Donald's place is peaceful and a nice place to stay

Private location. Super close to town
Single lane driveway we choose to not bring our promaster van
It is very quiet and
Shower and main bed are
Super comfortable

Donald's place was perfect for our needs. Super private and comfortable and close to Forest City where everything you need can be found. Check in and check out were a breeze and the unit was very clean with updated kitchen and bath. Great find, great price!
Great host. Great location. Super peaceful and quiet. Always a pleasure to stay here.

Cute airbnb, great location. Secluded and surrounded by nature, which I loved every minute of it. Very peaceful and quiet. I loved seeing the deer in the mornings. I also loved to walk through the woods down to the creek. I would stay here again and Don is a great host. Very attentive and responds in a timely manner

This was our very first time booking an Airbnb. It was so much easier than I expected. And way better and more comfortable than getting a hotel. We will definitely rebook for future visits to our friends in Forest City!

Perfect getaway. Very peaceful and close to everything. Would stay again. There aren’t any sofas or comfy chairs to recline in but the bed has an electric frame that was very easy to get comfortable in reading a book or working on my laptop.
Our stay was great. It was a 5 minute drive to downtown Forest City. House was well stocked, clean, and comfortable. Donald was a great host.
Peaceful sleeping quarters with a full kitchen nestled less than a mile from the shop’s & restaurants in downtown Forest City.
It was really great, a little treasure surrounded by nature - but still everything for the daily need was in within a 10-15 minute car ride. I’d come back anytime!
This was a great place to stay for rest after working.
We travel to the area on occasion for work projects. We’ve stayed at Donald’s place previously and we will be back when we have future projects in the area.
We love this place in the woods so close for us for a quick getaway. Comfy beds ,awesome shower , beautiful kitchen, lots of channels to choose from , cute town and so quiet !
beautiful property full of wildlife and peaceful surroundings. close to main Street, the thermal belt trail for those who enjoy a nice walk or bike ride and all the mountains have to offer.
We loved it! A place where we could relax and unwind. Being surrounded by nature gave us a peace that in the city is impossible to find. 100% recommended.
Don is a wonderful, responsive host. You can tell he really cares about your experience. We loved the place and hope to come back in the future!

The inside was beautiful. Immaculate and clean
Fully furnished. Met our needs very well.
The outside needs a little attention but it is winter.
This place was very clean and everything Donald said it was. He was very responsive when I had a question.

The place itself was nice as pictured in the photos, the walls of the duplex are very thin so you’d have to get lucky with the neighbors to have a quiet stay.
Donald is very responsive though I appreciated that.

Nice place nestled in the woods right outside of town. Clean and comfortable for the price. Only thing to note is that it is a duplex so as long as you have quiet respectful neighbors all should be well. Sadly, that wasn’t the case for us.

Private, beautiful surroundings, and extremely close to downtown Forest City with great restaurants (check out Pie Safe Bakery). It is a terrific value when compared to other Airbnbs or local hotels. I wouldn't hesitate to stay again or recommend to friends or family. The interior was well-kept, and clean, and wonderful walks through the beautiful property outside.

A comfy little hideaway in the woods .Our son decided to drive in from Va last minute to join us which was a bonus for my birthday . The home was very clean ! The beds we’re super comfortable and the new kitchen has everything you need to make a meal . We enjoyed our stay at the cabin .

Peaceful, secluded house in the woods. Thought the listing was for entire home. It was for 1/2 unit. Listing Title should reflect that. Too confusing to figure out when switching between listings Needed a local place close for a family funeral. Darkened shades were awesome for sleeping and getting used to the time change. The massaging bed was a nice surprise. Close to area attractions, small town feel. Unit was clean. A few minor issues, but Don came up with a great fix.
The greetings from the morning deer was very enjoyable.

Donald's place was great! Exactly what I was looking for. Peaceful, quiet, clean and homey. Everything was neat and clean. Would definitely stay here again! Donald was quick to get in contact with and made sure everything was perfect for my stay!

This is the second time I’ve stayed at this property . I absolutely love the privacy it’s secluded in the woods but a 5 minute drive to town . I can’t say it enough what a great host Don is . Anytime I text him for anything he responded right away he’s a great host that takes care of his guest .Since finding Dons place on Airbnb I won’t stay anywhere else. If your looking for a very nice place to stay I highly recommend Dons Place it’s a gem in the woods we love it and we will be back !!!!

Really nice kitchen and bathroom amenities!! Very convenient parking, outdoor lights made it easy to unload when we got there.
This stay was exactly what we needed and even accommodated a last minute addition of our dog

I booked Donald’s place because it was within 1 mile from the Thermal Belt Rail (bicycling) trail and not too far from Chimney Rock. What I didn’t know was how quaint the town of Forest City is which was an added bonus! You are about 1/2 mile from this quaint town yet you feel like you are in the middle of a forest with all nature sounds and no traffic sounds. There was a grouping of 7 huge turkeys crossing through the property at dusk yesterday. Donald was a responsive and conscientious host. We would definitely book his place again.
I highly recommend the locally homemade ice cream at Smith’s Drugs. Lots of creamy delicious flavors to choose from and very reasonably priced.
I felt just at home! Such a beautiful stay!

The driveway is a bit challenging but I had a truck so not an issue. Place was immaculate with a great kitchen & shower & comfortable beds. No separate living area but I knew that from the photos. Donald was very accommodating & let us check in early which was greatly appreciated.
Second time staying here. Highly recommend! Don is very responsive to inquiries and quite kind. Beautiful 28 acres to wander! Newly remodeled and very tasteful!

Lovely home! It’s 100 years old but recently updated to a high quality level. It’s a duplex but luckily had pretty quiet neighbors. 28 acres to explore. Don was proactive in communication. Highly recommended his home. I’ll be back.

this place was a little getaway. Donald was so helpful, and even though he was on his own vacation, he took the time to respond to any questions as soon as possible. the little place was spacious yet cozy. I'm not a fan of the bugs outside, but I was so comfortable there. it wasn't too far from the main st where we had good food and nice walks. bring good walking shoes or boots if you decide to walk through the trails. watch out for the sider webs! I'll definitely come back here if I visit this area again
Donald’s cottage was very clean and he was an accommodating host. We were aware it was a duplex when we booked, but there was slightly more noise than we were anticipating.
Great place. Great price. I had trouble with the door late at night gave Donald a call and he answered happy to help. I'll be back

Quiet, peaceful, and homey! Kitchen was very nice and beds (especially one of them) were really comfortable. The space has everything you’d need. I’ve stayed in quite a few Airbnb’s and this one definitely stands out for the value you receive in Don’s price!

Great place if you are looking for a quiet getaway and yet close to Main street.
Donald is very responsive and helpful
We very much enjoyed our stay at this quaint home away from home. Surrounded by beautiful landscape, the host is excellent and responds in a timely fashion.

Private and peaceful. Loved being able to stay so close to downtown and near Family at the same time. This is a duplex 2 bdrm, 1 bath, and a kitchen in each duplex. My next stay we will rent the whole house just to have extra space for a "family room" area. Thanks again Donald.
Nice stay to visit family. Don answered questions promptly. Nice place, very private, saw deer several times over the week, used grill and outdoor area. We will stay here again!

Donald was amazing! I came to the area and needed to stay for about a month. Don’s place was the perfect place for me and my dog. It is secluded but also very close to town. Know that there are technically two units at this properly, but I never had any issues with the guests staying on the other side. Don is a great host. He was always extremely quick to respond to messages / phone calls, very respectful and professional. This specific unit is 2 beds, 1 bath, and a large kitchen. There isn’t a a living room, but it was truly perfect for our stay. The appliances are completely up to date, and the place was very clean. There are some bugs, but that’s to be expected. I truly expected to see more in the house, but if you take care and keep the doors shut then no issues. You will see some critters such as deer or turkey, again, to be expected. I would absolutely stay here or any of Don’s units again
This Airbnb was lovely. It’s so clean and quiet. I love that’s it’s relatively close to the Main streets but still far enough for it to be private and secluded.
We had a nice stay. The house is surrounded by woods and very peaceful.
Great secluded stay, not too far from town. Would certainly stay again
It was great it’s in the woods peaceful. One of the beds is amazing its a z g I would come back for another stay!
We love this airbnb. Very private, beautiful surroundings, and comfortable bed. Secluded yet close enough to downtown. Donaldis a great host We will definitely be back
Had such a wonderful time at this amazing hideaway. Beautiful land and amazing hospitality. Donald was very helpful and welcoming. Def a new favorite spot
Pretty decent stay .
Donald was a great host, and was very accommodating and helpful.

Donald’s Airbnb was great! It was clean, private, and so close to Main Street in Forest City. The only downfall for me would be that laundry is not included in unit B. The picture of the laundry room in the detached basement in the listing gave me the impression that laundry was an offered amenity. Overall, my experience was great and I’d recommend it to my friends or family.
Good place to stay, great value. Donald was a great host, very accommodating.
Great little place to stay and enjoy the area

The unit was mostly as advertised. there was a glass sliding door between the bedrooms that had it not just been the two of us would have caused privacy issues. The host responded warmly to my suggestion of a curtain over the door. The unit was clean and well stocked. The property is very peacefull. The magnolia tree did drop quite a bit on our car since you have to park under it, just be aware. With in walking distance of town but, far enough out to feel like you're not. Donald was very freindly and responsive to communications. Good stay for a long weekend away!
The unit was very clean and well furnished. Have to be careful if you have a low profile car coming in on the driveway.

The host was incredible. He is very friendly and so helpful while we were visiting for the first time. The house was clean and had all the essentials. My favorite part was how close it was to the Main Street but still in the woods. Thank you for an amazing stay.
Fantastic host

The host was very kind and helpful! The property was very secluded, but not far from all of the sites that the surrounding areas had in store. It was exactly what we needed! Check in was easy, the rental was very clean, and everything was comfortable and accommodating. We would love to stay again!
We needed a place close to our newly purchased lot and this was perfect. Thank you.
Great spot for our short stay

Our stay here was great. Donald was very attentive and always available. YOU MUST FOLLOW HIS DIRECTIONS TO GET THERE! I didn’t read his check in instructions completely which detailed the directions for arrival and advised against using gps software and of course I got lost. Lol. But Donald was very responsive and helpful with the arrival. The place was clean and almost new if not new. I have no complaints and will prob be back when I’m in the area.

I only wish we had booked more time! Forest City needs to be explored and this Airbnb is wonderful! We were just passing through for the night, but next time we will book more time to explore the area. Don's place is extremely comfortable with everything you need for comfort and cooking. Loved the bed with "magic fingers"! Got a chance to chat with Don, and learned so much about the property's history. Btw- immaculate!

We were in town for a drag race and initially selected the house for its convenience and proximity to track, but were pleasantly surprised by the charm of the farmhouse and surroundings. The house was very comfortable, very clean and well equipped. Brenda was so thoughtful in providing many incidentals that made our stay comfortable and stress free! I hope to have a return stay to relax and further enjoy the farm atmosphere sitting on the porch watching the horses or take in the pond.
Thank you for a wonderful stay!
Great place, private and so peaceful.

Oh what a lovely place! So PEACEFUL! We had such a relaxing stay. Everything was just perfect… From everything you could possibly need in the kitchen, to the soft beds, to the spotlessly clean interior, to the lovely decor, and to the perfect back patio with beautiful views! I love that it was a short drive to town to enjoy restaurants, ice cream, and fun thrift stores, and antique shopping! But, at the end of the day, the best thing was the house itself. Perfect place to refresh your soul!

Wow! This is a great AirBnB. It's about an hours drive from the Charlotte Airport, too, so its convenient for anyone who is traveling out the day after your stay.
The pictures show you just what you will experience. It's a VERY PRIVATE place, and you get the whole house to yourself. It's quiet. The house has all you need if you want to make a meal or want to grill out, etc.
We spent our night there at the end of our trip, and it was such a great, relaxing evening. We relaxed outside under a shelter attached to the back patio, and we smoked cigars while the rain pelted the roof of the shelter. It was a perfect way to end our trip and relax after driving so much the other days.
We highly recommend this place, and if we're in the area in the future, we would recommend staying with Brenda at this great AirBnB.

Wonderful place. Better than the pictures show. We were only there for 1 night, but could have stayed much longer. Highly, highly request this stay to anytime looking for a peaceful place to relax and enjoy those around you.

Brenda' Sugar Ranch sure exceeded our expectations with it's extreme cleanliness and thought out Southern charm decor. The personal touches make the stay cozy and comfortable. Peacefulness is at a premium allowing for great relaxation in the hammocks. However, if you care to be more adventurous you can explore trails or fish and kayak on the pond. Beyond gracious the host was available to answer any questions. In addition to this delightful place, the surrounding area is just as beautiful with lots of options from hiking in the mountains to dining in a charming town and much more. Our family of four had a time and wish to return.

This place deserves a 15 on a scale from 1 to 10! It is a rare gem, beyond beautiful AND very quiet. This host was a generous host and made sure I had a fantastic stay. This host has literally thought of everything a guest might need! The home is comfortable, clean, and very well appointed. Check-in and check-out were easy. My family will definitely visit again!

I was taken aback by the breathtaking views. Brenda was the perfect hostess. She made sure everything in order for our arrival. The house and the outdoor area is absolutely spotless and immaculate. This was the perfect family-friendly spot. The host thoughtfully provided games and books for our little ones, making the stay even more memorable! Loved the vintage charm of this place! The host has done an incredible job preserving its character while offering modern conveniences. The front porch is a serene oasis, perfect for morning coffee. I was blown away by the attention to detail! The host stocked the kitchen with essentials, and the coffee/tea area is incredible. They did not skimp on any details! I slept so well! Our host went above and beyond to make sure we felt at home. We cannot wait to return. Thank you again for having us!
One of the most special places I’ve stayed! Beautiful land, beautiful pond, fire pit, this place has it all! Will definitely return if I’m ever in the area

Unbelievable place to stay! Super comfortable and beautiful surroundings! Definitely will be back soon! Farm is so peaceful and Brenda and her family were amazing hosts!! Would give 6 stars if that were possible!
The kids had a wonderful time playing at the pond.
Loved this home. We would highly recommend and, with family nearby, hope to return.
We had a wonderful stay at your clean and cozy cottage. Very inviting home and a very comfortable stay! We enjoyed sipping tea in the morning out on the porch. Thanks for hosting us!

Great stay at this truly cozy place. Incredibly clean and had everything that we needed for a quick getaway. Rutherfordton is close by and had so many stores and local restaurants to choose from. Hope to be back!
Rhonda’s place was perfect for our girls getaway. It was easy to find, well appointed for all needs. Very comfortable bedding. Really enjoyed the screen porch as well. Would definitely return.
What a FANTASTIC house. Beautifully decorated but still felt like home. We are definitely staying there again. Walking distance to downtown and very easy to get to.

The place worked out great for the four us as we planned on riding the Thermal Belt trail nearby.
We were rained out , but will try again.
Very nice place .
If we are in the area again we will come back. Very nice porch, comfy beds, and all you need of the basics.
Beautiful home! Loved staying there. Will definitely stay there again when passing through.
Beautiful cabin, very clean, easy walking distance to the town. Rhonda was an excellent host!!

The house was very cozy cottage -love the screened in porch area and the kitchen nook . It was very clean and the parking was right outside the door very easy access. The kitchen and bathroom was stocked with all the amenities you would need.
The cottage was so cute, spotless and well appointed. We enjoyed relaxing on the screened in porch and walking to downtown restaurants. Easy drive to TIEC.

Rhonda’s place was such a great place to land after a long day in the car. Stayed her on our way down from Michigan to Florida. The downtown was very charming and food from the Copper Penny was fantastic! I highly recommend this little haven for your next road trip.
Wonderful place to stay, felt right at home and conveniently private and quiet while In town. Would definitely recommend!

This was the best stay!! Smelled so clean when we arrived!! And the house was adorable!! Due to an early cheer competition we were only there to sleep and we were so sad we didn’t have more time there because the house was so perfect!! Will 100% stay again!!
Rhonda was an amazing host as usual!!
This was a great little cottage style home in a quiet town. It is a perfect lazy getaway. The screen in room was so wonderful. Definitely will book here again.

This was one of our best stays. From the flexible check-in, to the well appointed home, it is an ideal property.
Well equipped to include a washer/dryer. gas fire place, and one of the easiest to use smart TVs for mirroring a tablet or laptop.
Great communication, cozy environment and extremely comfortable bed!

Adorable little cottage. We made a day trip up to Forest City and just needed a place to spend the night. Location was great, walking distance to Main Street. We had dinner at the Copper Penny. The cottage was clean and super cute with an updated kitchen and bath. There is a screened in porch that we would have loved to use, but it was just a little too cold to sit outside when we were there. If we make it back, we'd definitely stay again.

We really enjoyed our stay! The house was perfect and within walking distance to downtown Forest City. The space was clean and perfect for our family of 5. We hope to be able to come back and stay again in the future!
It was our very first Air bnb experience and the bar was set high! We will definitely be going back!

We came for a girls weekend to see the Christmas lights. home was easy to find, very clean, well decorated, and comfy! we walked to dinner nearby and enjoyed the lights and shops downtown. we all slept well on comfy beds with awesome linens. I don't have a single bad thing to say. forest city is a super cute little town!

We had a great stay at Rhonda’s place while visiting family in my hometown. If you’re looking for somewhere to stay close to downtown Forest City, this is it! Easily walkable to restaurants and shopping in the downtown area with easy access to the walking trail in the county (the rail trail). We had everything we needed!

The cottage was conveniently located and extremely clean. It was super cute and decorated for Christmas which was a really nice touch. It’s located extremely close to downtown Forest City so there are good restaurant options. Rhonda made sure we had everything we needed and we really enjoyed our stay.
Very convenient.
the cottage was close to town so very easy access to the restaurants and shops. very cozy Place very clean.
Really there for 1 night in transit but gotta say, "top choice" very clean , convenient, comfortable and super cute...thanks!
Rhonda was amazingly responsive and was so accommodating. We felt right at home! Only a 10 minute walk (or 3 minute drive) from downtown Forest City.
Just feels like home away from home and thats all that matters. Cozy, Loveable, clean and wonderful
This was our second stay at Rhonda’s home and it was as charming and comfortable as our first visit!
Great place - very clean. Walkable to restaurants and activities. Would definitely stay here again. Host were great - responsive and friendly.
We had a lovely stay. The home is small and cozy but packs everything you need into that space.
The place was very nice & cozy. The host was very kind & responsive. My boyfriend and I would love to come back & stay here again in the future.
Absolutely fantastic hostess, beautifully appointed home, thoughtful touches. we will definitely return ❤️
Great place! My coworker and I really enjoyed it. Felt right at home.

The cottage is beautifully decorated and very clean. The beds were comfortable and the bathroom was ample in size. We will definitely stay there again when we are passing through and visiting with family.

This home was so nice and cute! Perfect place for a little girls night. Rhonda sent me instructions ahead of time (we were able to check in at any time), and the house had everything we needed - washing machine, detergent, lots of towels, shampoo/soap, cooking oil, etc. The only thing was we couldn't get the heat working, but that might have been because it was the first cold weekend in the fall. Also would have loved curtains or blinds in the house for privacy, but we still loved the place and had such a lovely time.

Excellent location with extremely easy access to the Thermal Belt Bike Trail. House looks small on the outside but has three nicely appointed bedrooms with an huge king-sized bed in the master bedroom. Everything inside has been very well done with a rustic look. Floors are beautiful and one wall appears to have been done from reclaimed wood. We can’t say enough good things about the Thermal Belt Bike Trail. One of the best rail trails we have ever ridden, plus Forest City is a great little town.
Absolutely beautiful place to stay! Would highly recommend!

One of the nicest Airbnb’s ever and we’ve stayed at many different ones all over the country. Ample kitchen supplies, towels, blankets and very clean. The cottage is cozy and the beds are very comfortable. Rhonda has a flair for decorating and you will feel like you’re staying at a friend’s home. As a former VRBO owner, I am very picky because I provided a very clean and hospitable rental and expect the same from others. Rhonda was responsive to all questions. Our only issue was with the gas fireplace which operated, but set off the smoke alarm. My husband loves the coziness of a fireplace so I mention it only because that may be important to someone else,too. The cottage is in a quiet neighborhood next to a church and felt safe and within easy walking distance to downtown. We visited the Cherry Mt. General Store, Lake Lure and many area restaurants, parks,etc. We would gladly stay again if we were ever in the area. A very pleasant experience.
House was accommodating. Had all the necessities. Beds were comfortable. Easy check in and out.
Thanks so much for making your lovely little cottage available for our girls weekend! We had a wonderful time!!
Rhonda is an amazing host!! & the house is always so clean!

My family and I loved this little cottage! Everything was just as the description noted. It worked for everything we needed it to. The cottage was well decorated and clean. When walking in, it smelled fresh and like a cozy home. It had all the essentials; plenty of towels. The king bed was super comfortable. We loved the butcher block countertops in the kitchen and “antique doors,” and floors. I do wish there was another bathroom. Rhonda was very responsive both when booking and for questions/comments. The guest book was super helpful for recommendations!
Thank you again for a wonderful stay!
We always try to find Rhonda’s place when we are in the area! I believe this is our third time staying! We always enjoy it! Rhonda is a great host and the house is always spotless!
We had a great weekend at Rhonda’s place! We would visit again!
Adorable cottage in a great location. Within walking distance to tons of cute shops and restaurants. Had everything we needed and we would definitely stay here again.
Great location. Mattress and furniture were top quality. The space is peaceful and thoughtfully organized.
We love staying at this Air BnB when we come up to see our son who attends GWU. This was our 4th stay.
Rhonda is a wonderful host!! We have had the opportunity to stay a few times for work proposes! Grateful we found this place!
Absolutely loved this AirBnB. If we ever have reason to return to the area, this will be the place to stay. So homey and beautiful. Just loved it.
Rhonda was an amazing host!! && the house was beautiful!
A simply lovely little home decorated adorably with everything you need for your stay. My friends and I had so much fun here and hated to leave.
What a delightful little house! I felt right at home and comfortable during my stay, and I look forward to staying there again in a later visit. You will love it!
Was in town visiting my friends. This place was really nice. Will be coming back to this place

Cozy cottage, close to our events, very clean and had everything we needed.
Loved the coffee bar!

We were just passing through for the night and it was perfect for our purposes. Easy to get in/out, the house was clean, and it looked just like the description. I particularly liked the screened-in porch.

My family and I were in the area overnight for a Spartan race and stayed at Rhonda’s listing- absolutely exceeded my expectations!! The home is very cozy and clean, accommodated us 5 very comfortably, was 15 min or so to the equestrian venue where the race was held, and communication was prompt, warm, and clear throughout the stay. Highly recommend staying here if you get the chance, excellent experience, definitely five stars. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
This is my second time staying in this beautiful house and it won’t be my last! It is so cozy and conveniently located. It’s one of the nicest Airbnb’s I have stayed in!

My family was attending a horse show and this was the perfect place to start and end our day! The home was exactly as described yet still exceeded our expectations. My family's favorite memory of the weekend was sitting in the living room under the cozy blankets watching a movie! Rhonda was very communicative and I felt we could get in touch at any time. The home is a very short walk to downtown for coffee, dinner, and ice cream. We look forward to going back for a future show!
Adorable bungalow. Loved the layout and decor. Short walk to restaurant and retail shops. Rhonda was a wonderful host!
Rhonda's house is beautiful and clean! Rhonda was very attentive but respected our privacy. We were only in town for a few nights but thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
The cutest little place, within walking distance to eateries and shops. Will definitely look into staying again next year
We had a wonderful stay! It was very peaceful, close to all the locations we needed, comfortable, clean, and beautifully decorated! Thank you!

I needed a getaway for a couple of days and this house did not dissapoint! The atmosphere was perfect. My favorite part was reading on the private porch while the rain was falling :). Whether you want to just relax or get out and be active, this location is great for both. I will stay here again when I come back to Forest City!
Everything was as described. Great little location.
Great place to stay. Rhonda was very helpful and always responded to all communication.
Beautiful house. Great location.

This was a great place to spend our weekend in Forest City. The home was beautifully decorated. It was spotless and had everything we needed. I will definitely stay there again when I can. Thank you Rhonda!
Lovely, lovely place.
The home was as described. Clean and very convenient/walkable to Forest City's downtown.
House was very clean and cozy. I felt like I was back at home and could quickly relax. We were just passing through but wish we could have enjoyed it longer, we would definitely stay here again.

We stayed in this cute house while we were in town for a graduation at GWU. It was clean and very cute. The shower had everything you needed. It was more affordable than a hotel. We ordered lunch platters from the Copper Penny and came back for a little celebration. I would highly recommend this place.
This is our third stay and as always everything was perfect. So glad to have found this Airbnb.
This is our favorite Airbnb that we have stayed at. It was beautifully decorated, comfortable, and in a great location. We will definitely be back!
Great place
This stay added something special to our wedding experience.

We had a wonderful night stay here on our way to Florida. The house was clean and comfortable and being able to walk to town was great. The town is very quaint and nice to walk around with all the trees lit up at night. I would highly recommend a stay here!
Beautiful Home! Felt right at home!
The house was lovely. My bridesmaids and I stayed here the night before my wedding. It was very clean and well taken care. Spacious and had plenty of room for all of us to sleep comfortably.
Great place
Cottage was quite clean and had cute decor. Communication was great. Thanks, Rhonda!
Beautiful cottage!! We will definitely come back :)
Wonderful visit! Highly recommend. House is close to a very beautiful quaint downtown area!
It’s a great place to stay
Great place to stay
Great little spot to spend a few days for a nearby wedding. As described and well cared for. Would recommend a stay if ever in the area. Thanks!
Great place great owner
Beautiful home, and wonderful location!! Loved walking on the rail trail that’s runs beside the home! Really enjoyed our stay!!
2nd time staying and everything was perfect! Already booked to return the end of April.
She is great to work with
Nice thank place
Good house
Great place

We thoroughly enjoyed our weekend stay in Rhonda’s beautiful, well appointed home. It had everything we needed for a fun and relaxing time in Forest City. We’ve already booked her home again to come back and enjoy the festivities at Christmas!
Absolutely beautiful house! Very cozy environment and beautiful decor! The host was very responsive and friendly!
Honestly, I was overwhelmed by how adorable this place was!
This was a beautiful, cozy, clean and private cottage. Great for a quiet and peaceful getaway. We loved the screened in porch.

The cottage was wonderful and Rhonda was super friendly to my parents and very responsive when needed. I rented the cottage for my family so we could spend Christmas together. They loved the decorations, and my mom was super grateful for the Christmas tree already decorated. (She was afraid we wouldn't have one). The cottage itself, looks small on the outside but everyone was comfortable with plenty of room to sleep, play card games, watch movies, and open Christmas presents. I'm local to the area, however my mom said she would love to spend another weekend in Forest City. The location of the cottage is within walking distance of most of the best food and shopping Forest City has to offer. If you ever find yourself in the area, I would highly recommend staying here. Thank you Rhonda for giving my family the best Christmas we've had in a while.
This was the perfect spot for us to stop for a night on a long drive to Tennessee with a toddler. The place was adorable and just as described. Would absolutely stay again!
Great
Great accommodations! Check in was very easy. Such a delight to walk in and feel as though we were at home! Would recommend 100%!
Great house and owner

Our stay was wonderful. We would definitely stay here again. Rhonda's personal touch to make sure you feel right at home was amazing (right down to the mini pie from the Pie Safe waiting on us and the Christmas tree being lit when we walked in 🥰).

Rhonda did a great job communicating with us. The house is close enough to downtown to walk, but it is on the edge of being too far, and the walk is a little dark. We enjoyed the house and downtown during our business-oriented trip.
Great place to stay when visiting Forest City with an easy walk to the downtown area. Very nicely furnished and comfortable.

The showers are clean as new and there is great water pressure. The kitchen is well stocked with flatware and utensils. It is convenient to have a washer and dryer in the house to use as needed.
We enjoyed the fire pit outback by roasting s’mores and staying warm while viewing the stars. There are many recreational activities within a two hour drive of Donald’s house, our favorite was DuPont State Park.
The house is immaculate!
Don's place was new and spotless. The property was beautiful and was a perfect place to rest a few days. He was very informative and personable.
Great location! The house is very clean and comfortable. It’s only 15 minutes to TIEC. Beautiful property!

Donald is a great host. The house is beautiful and clean. We enjoyed the view and saw lots of wildlife. This place gives the feeling of seclusion but is close to everything we needed. If our travels bring us to this area in the future, we will definitely seek lodging with Donald.

Don's place really is a beautiful place to unwind and get in touch with nature. The house itself is wonderful, with high ceilings and lots of light. The decor is top-notch, the kitchen and appliances are all excellent. So much thought has been put into all of the little details within the house. It was larger and more spacious than we expected and watching the deer feeding right outside the window really is an added bonus !
Don is very responsive, immediately providing anything we asked for. Although the house itself feels isolated on top of the hill, it's really only a few minutes to the main street and less than 10 minutes from major shopping areas. The local area of Forest City is very quaint, certainly worth a stroll down the main street and the weekly farmer's market was fun to stroll through and chat with the very friendly folks. In addition, it's only a short drive up to Lake Lure and a little over an hour to Asheville.
Highly recommend to anyone that wants a great tranquil location, relax and enjoy the nature or go around and explore a beautiful part of N. Carolina.

Donald’s house was perfect for us. Very comfortable, great view. Forest City is a lovely town. Be sure to visit the Pie Safe. Great hiking in South Mountain state park, 45 mins away. Donald was very welcoming and responsive. Highly recommend 😊
5 star! Donald was a great host and the Airbnb was such a beautiful place to stay.
This place by far is one of the nicest we have stayed in for our trips to TIEC. The updated kitchen was amazing as we like to bring our own food. Would definitely come back!

My boyfriend and I stayed at this location just to get out of town for a little while. It was absolutely perfect. Minutes from downtown where there is great food and it was in the center of various fun outdoor activities. Donald was an amazing host and quick with responding. We will be back!
Peaceful, clean, and well-kept home. We enjoyed getting away and relaxing with our family. Our stay was very comfortable and enjoyable.

The house is super stylish and has a lot of cool upgrades. It’s super comfortable and our favorite parts were the huge kitchen island and front porch. We wanted to use the fire pit but it rained on us. We grilled and cooked and the kitchen pretty much had all of the utensils we needed. Don was super helpful and quick to answer any questions we had. We will be back next time we visit Lake Lure.
Very nice and spacious! Great kitchen space!

This is a cozy, elegant place to stay in Forest City. The best part is the view: You can see the mountains in the background and wild deer walking near the house. You can even watch the sunset on the porch! The house is spacious and kept very clean. Also, the downtown area is only minutes away with restaurants and shopping. Donald is an excellent host and worked tirelessly to help us when any issues arose. Other than the internet being too slow for us to work on some online projects, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
With Donald, it was really nice, there is everything you need for a longer stay. We will be happy to come back next time.

Donald was a perfect host. His home is beautiful, comfortable, stylish, and clean. The view is gorgeous. Me and my family thoroughly enjoyed our peaceful weekend. Close to town but it didn't feel like it. Will definitely stay here again.

Excellent value for the money. Extremely clean and gorgeous home. Very updated and modern. Easy check in and check out. Had everything we needed and more. Won’t stay anywhere else when visiting Forest City.

Great place, host, and town. We have nothing but good memories from our stay. There was an issue with the faucet, but Don was there in 5 minutes or less. The home is impeccably decorated and clean. Small touches of thoughtful conveniences are all over. Mr. Don was great to speak with and get to know just a little bit. The town center is right out of a Hallmark movie (I’m guessing) 😉

Would recommend! Great views, great value! Forest city is such a neat little community nestled between Asheville and Charlotte! Donald’s place was very accommodating to my family, and our 9 month old little girl. Very clean with all needed amenities. We will be back!

Don’s house is Forest City was absolutely perfect for our needs. It had everything, and more, that we needed for a long weekend. It is was the most charming and beautiful AirBnB we have ever stayed in (and there have been many). Don was onsite to greet us and show us around, and was available if/when we ever needed him. I would rate his home as Excellent and would highly recommend to anyone.
Was a nice great secluded place to stay. Lots of open fields around so me & my son brought little rc airplanes & had a blast also.
Found the home to be very nice. It was perfect for what we needed.
Bryant’s place was everything as described plus more. 10/10. I would love to stay again.
Great stay, thank you for sharing your home with us
Comfortable house for our group!!!
Thank you Bryant for a wonderful stay at your home, all the amenities that we needed. Very responsive and eager to make sure our stay met all our needs.
Beautiful and well stocked home. Very spacious and had everything we needed for a large group. Very close to town but quiet and relaxing location. Would highly recommend.

This property was exactly as described or even better. It has 3 bedrooms on the first floor (nice for those with limited mobility) and 3 on the second floor. There are 3 baths, one in the separate primary suite, another on the first floor, and one upstairs. There is a large kitchen and living room. Everything was clean and neat. The bathrooms had an ample supply of linens and travel-size toiletries. The property is in an area that is convenient, yet peaceful, with other houses nearby but not too close. It was perfect for our group of equestrians showing at nearby Windridge Farm. Our host Bryant gave clear instructions and responded within minutes to my questions. The house rules were not onerous. We would definitely stay here again.
It’s a very good house!!
We enjoyed our weekend at Bryant’s Forest City Retreat. Great and welcoming home where we were comfortable. The host was great and very responsive. We look forward to booking again.
Thank you Bryant for a wonderful stay! The house was as described and just what we needed.

This Forest City home was in a perfect location for the local wineries and Tryon Equestrian Center! Most of the top wineries in the area were less than 30 minutes drive and one special place, My Sweet Love winery just 10 minutes away. I felt right at home with all the accommodations and thoroughly enjoyed sitting out by the fire pit sipping a glass of wine! Grab your friends and come stay together in this home while enjoying all the local attractions and dining within a short drive! I will return again.
Lori’s place is always a treat to stay at. We will continue to stay with her. The location is exactly as described and pictured.
Great as always! Perfect place to stay while showing at TIEC. Convenient location and pristine house makes Lori's places a repeat favorite!
Wonderful stay! Convenient to Tryon Equestrian.
Great location and cottage worked out great for our needs.
Always a pleasure!

Nice renovation of an older building on the Main Street of town. We were able to walk everywhere we needed to go. The place was clean, attractive, spacious and well equipped. Even had an ironing board and a real iron. The palace to stay in Forest City. Forest City is an attractive, friendly town with a great pie bakery and a real lunch counter.
Stayed here twice . It has been great both times
Great location on Main St and central to everything we needed to do. Bright, airy and clean! Would stay here again!
We booked on very shirt notice, everything was tip top, very nice and neat place will stay there again for sure.
Great stay! This will be our new spot when we visit our daughter.

This was one of the nicest places we have stayed at while competing at Tryon. My daughter and employees stayed here. House was great, location was great for being close to stores and restaurants. It was 20 minutes from the show, but that was manageable. We will definitely consider Lori's place in the future.
Fantastic stay wth Lori as usual!
The place looked even better than the pictures! We enjoyed walking Main Street to the shops & restaurants! Would recommend this place to anyone who is looking in Forest City!
Lori was very helpful with any questions. Her house was very nice and inviting.

Lori was a great host who accommodated our stay, allowing for a last minute request of an extra night. We had an amazing stay right off of Main St. and close to restaurants and shops in the main part of Forest City. Extremely clean and incredibly comfortable beds! Would definitely stay there again.

Lori was a fantastic host! I messaged her to see if she had an iron/board and told her it wasn’t a problem for me to go buy if she didn’t. She apologized and told me to buy and leave in the unit and promptly refunded what I had spent plus a little extra.
The place was exactly as described and very neat and comfortable. Highly recommend for a place to stay if visiting Forest City NC!
Perfect place to stay and location. Will book again in the future.

excellent stay, really enjoyed the updated kitchen and bathroom. really like that there is a washer and dryer in the unit as well as easy parking. very convenient and easy to find and convenient to tiec.

Stayed with my husband and our two young boys. We were in the unfortunate circumstance of needing to find a place immediately to be with family when my father in law lost his life to cancer. Lori was super responsive and answered my messages within and hour and helped us get booked. Her cottage was beautiful, so clean, and immediately felt like home away from home. We were so grateful to have found it and will gladly book it again sometime. The hard wood floors are refinished and so charming. The kitchen is super updated with newer appliances. Very comfortable bedrooms and beds and the walk in shower is SO nice. It was the perfect space for the 4 of us.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The cottage was very nice and clean and exceeded our expectations. We would definitely stay here again and would recommend to others!
Great!!
Great place to stay. Easy to get to. Very clean and had everything we needed.
We’ve stayed here twice now and it’s always nice and clean. She’s easy to communicate with. The place is in quaint downtown Forest City!
Enjoyed our stay & wouldn't hesitant to stay at Lori's place again! Very, very convenient to Downtown Forest City. Have thoroughly enjoyed the festivities for Christmas in Forest City! Awesome!
Lori was a great host. Place was perfect!

2nd time I've stayed with Lori! Was in town showing at TIEC. Home was well appointed and very clean. Area at night is quiet as well. Walking distance to Forest City downtown strip (highly recommend Coppery Penny restaurant and Pie Safe Baking Co) and 5min drive to the grocery store. Easy access to the highway was a plus as well! Would recommend & for sure stay again!
Excellent location, excellent accommodations. I will certainly recommend this spot to my family and friends!

A wonderful stay!
We were in town for a wedding, and Lori accommodated an early check in for us so our 2 toddlers could take naps.
The house was cozy, clean, and spacious, and the location was incredible!
5/5 would do again.
An awesome place to live in while enjoying vacation.
I grew up in Rutherford county and I was happy to be home visiting my parents. This place was clean and in a great location! We’ll definitely be back!
Wonderful stay

If you are looking for a unique space in a unique location, this wonderful place is it. It’s spacious and laid out in a linear pattern — you enter through the front and walk through the sitting area into the living area (watch your step), through the kitchen to the huge (to us anyway) bathroom and the bedrooms. The unit was neat and decorated in a style that I will call “contemporary quaint.” One feels right at home immediately. I would have stayed in the living room area if I could have. The kitchen is also nice, and while we didn’t have to use anything but the refrigerator (and the microwave for the popcorn that was so generously supplied), it was nice to be in a place where everything looked so new. The island in the kitchen was a great place to sit and use a laptop to catch up on some work. The main bedroom was spacious, with a king-size bed that was comfortable. (If you are light-sensitive, be mindful of the security lights for the parking area; they are a little bright.)
The unit sits right at an intersection on what is the the main thoroughfares in town. But people hardly notice you. It was great for a particular kind of people watching. We didn’t need to contact our host, but we felt that if we needed anything, she would be available at a moment’s notice. The parking area large and secure. We really enjoyed being here and found ourselves wishing we had one an extra day to spend there. Nice place, great host.
I highly recommend staying here! The place was clean, recently renovated, comfortable beds and the host was both accommodating and responsive.

This is a wonderful home in a great location. You can walk through town. Close local restaurants (within walking distance). Thermal Belt Rails to Trails is easy to access. Beautiful decor. Lori responded quickly to any questions.
What a lovely, clean, and inviting space! Check in was so easy, it was nice to cook and clean up there. Plenty of parking. And it is walking distance from pelican snowballs!
Book it! Just Book this place if it fits your needs. Great location. Updated. Feels like home. This is the place your looking for.
Very cute, spacious, nicely designed space.
It was so relaxing and comfortable. A beautiful space. (I am sorry I was not able to listen to the music lessons being given there. )

Olivewood Inn is a beautiful historic home and the whole property is immaculately kept. We rented both rooms for two couples while in town to attend a local wedding and cannot say enough about our experience! Eben was a fantastic host and his passion for the curatorship of this property shows everywhere you look.
This was my favorite stay of my week long trip. Gorgeous room in an impressive house with beautiful grounds. Everything was top notch, including Eben.
It was exactly how we pictured it! Very quaint and cozy! When I walked in I was in awe ! Great experience and Eben is very nice!
We will return

We absolutely loved The Olive Wood Inn…perfect location right at downtown Forest City! Immaculately clean and everything you could possibly need plus alot of extras. Loved the vintage styles and touches..the shower was amazing. Eben was an A+ host..meet us upon our arrival and showed us around the house and great conversation. We will be back again!
Great place to stay close to all the Christmas events.

This is an absolutely lovely, well maintained, historical home and Eben is a wonderful host. This was more than just an overnight stay. It was a charming look back in history filled with amazing architecture, antique furnishings and in a lovely setting. I hope we can visit again!!
The Olivewood Inn is a great place to stay to visit the cute town of Forest City and ride the Thermal Belt Rail Trail. Eben was a great host!

Eben is very nice and so is his place. One can see all the work and money and love he’s put into it. The bed was extremely comfortable and so was the comforter. Eben didn’t mind taking the time to tell us about the place, which is beautifully done. The location is perfect if you want to take in an Owl’s game.
He put out some muffins and fruit for breakfast and the muffins were the best I’ve ever had. He also very generously puts water and a few other beverages in the fridge.
We had our bedroom and bathroom and could use the shared sitting room that has plenty of books and Netflix on TV.
The only inconveniences were that the bathroom door opens in the opposite way that would easy and the only outlet is on the floor by the door, so if you want to do your hair in the bathroom, bring an extension cord.
We had a great sleep and a lovely morning.
Eben was a very welcoming host. We felt right at home in his clean inn. The bathroom was beautiful and the room was spotless. Definitely will book here again!
Eben was a great host and his home was beautiful and comfortable. We will definitely try to stay there again if we are in the area!
Had a wonderful stay. Eben greeted me at the door. Beautiful home and grounds. It was very peaceful and close to Asheville. I look forward to staying there again.

We had a very nice stay at Eben's place. We came for the Cherry Bounce festival and discovered so much more! The house is in a great location that allowed us to walk everywhere we wanted to be - the Pavilion, downtown restaurants, the beautiful trail and the ballpark. It was nice to have a separate area for coffee and muffins in the morning. We even took advantage of the gazebo and had a picnic lunch. All in all, a very relaxing weekend with lovely accommodations.
Even was welcoming and his mansion was gorgeous. Clean and safe and just wonderful. I will stay there again and again.

The Olivewood Inn met every expectation. It was true to its advertised description, from the charming elegance and style of the Inn, to the comfort of the Oak Room with its wonderful bed. The Olivewood Inn met every expectation. Of utmost importance to me was the cleanliness of the Inn, the linens, etc. The lovely outdoor area contributed to the calm, peaceful and serene vibe. Eben, the host was very gracious and accommodating. I would recommend staying here to anyone visiting the area and know I will return next time I’m here to see family.
Beautiful place to stay and so close to downtown forest city. Eban was a great host!
Bed was very comfortable. Location is convenient to downtown restaurants and attractions. Light breakfast provided. Eben was great with communication, even leading to the stay.

My third stay at this location and definitely not my last. The house is wonderful and Eben is an excellent host and great company! It's the perfect setting for a Christmas time visit to downtown Forest City.

Eben is a fantastic host! I felt welcomed and safe. This was my first stay using Airbnb and he has set the bar high for any future experiences. Olivewood Inn is a charming historic home located roughly between Charlotte and Asheville. It was the perfect place to stop and rest after a long day of travel. I highly recommend it.
Wonderful host, incredibly flexible, and an ABSOLUTELY AMAZING PROPERTY. We are already planning our next stay here!
Such a lovely inn and near so many beautiful outdoor areas.

The building, the design, the layout and decor were stunning! It was easy to feel like you were in a elegant European villa with privacy. The room was decorated expertly and comfortably. Antique unique charm but all the amenities needed. A generous morning breakfast. A beautiful koi pond and gazebo sitting area. Eben was patient, accommodating, present as needed and gave us privacy. This is a stay that deserves to be savored and appreciated
This house is so pretty and Eben was a great host. He was very communicative and everything was as I expected!

The inn is a beautiful historic home in Forest City. It is a mixture of old world quality as well as southern charm. My room was Very comfortable, I slept well and enjoyed the chandelier above the bed. Robes are furnished.
The atmosphere was quiet. There is a library and sitting room to watch TV.
Eben was a very good host and was helpful, getting my bags to the room.
It is a place you will want to visit again.

What a great find! If your trip takes you to the Forest City area, I highly recommend staying here if you can. The pictures do not do it justice. You will not be disappointed. I have stayed at many Airbnb for business and this lovely house is at the top of my list. I stayed here while on a business trip and Eben has everything a business traveler needs: quiet floor where my room was located, privacy, fast and reliable wifi, PLENTY of power outlets in the room (this was so appreciated), and a desk in my room with great light. Eben was a great host who was genuinely concerned with making sure I had a good stay. The bed was very comfortable. I definitely plan on staying here the next time I have business in the area. It's located about halfway between Charlotte and Asheville, so is a convenient drive to both areas. You won't be disappointed if you choose Eben's beautiful and luxurious villa to stay in!

What an incredible find! I have stayed at dozens of AirBnb's and Eben's home is a jewel. The house is just amazing. The marble floors and all of the original woodwork in the house was so beautiful. Eben is a great host. The room had every amenity (terry cloth robes, anyone?). I will definitely plan to stay here again!
Great place. Eben was a great host. Loved the olivewood inn!!!
What a gem! Beautiful home, great amenities and a wonderful host. Close to TIEC.
Excellent! Very beautiful building with relaxing spaces to ok enjoy a book, movie, or snack. Breakfast was a nice touch.
Beautiful home with a great host!

An incredible stay at a unique and stunning residence. Eben is thoughtful and communicative. The home is beautifully decorated, and the host provides everything one could want in an evening.. I will stay here again if I have the opportunity.

If you enjoy beautiful homes and gardens and wonderful antiques, this is the place of your dreams. Even better, this is not a museum and you may use the furniture. The fridge in the room was a necessity for me. The shower was the coolest thing ever. Also the refrigerator in the sitting room was well stocked as was the coffee maker. The place was immaculately clean and Eben was the perfect host asking regularly how he could fulfill my every need, which he managed to do very well. Even more the place was much closer to my destination than the big city.

Eben was an incredible host and my husband and I had the best time staying in the oak room! I cannot wait to return to the Olivewood Inn anytime I am in or around Forest City and I cannot recommend it enough!

This is an outstanding value in a quaint little place very much decorated in an early 1900’s period style. It is elegant and truly charming. We were in Forest City for a bicycle on the Thermal Belt Rail Trail and one of the best parts of our stay was the fact that this little place is only a block off the trail so we have easy access without traveling by car. All of the little extras that the host provided demonstrated an extraordinary attention to detail. This was truly a wonderful stay.

Eben was a great host and so accommodating! Absolutely “Super”.
The house is wonderful. Built in 1924, the home has a lot of character. (Bed was great which is always important to me.)
If I come back for the Cycle NC ride again in Forest City, I will definitely stay at Eben’s house.
Gayle

My stay at the Olivewood was fantastic! The house is beautiful both outside with its garden and gazebo, and the inside with a piano and spiraling staircase. Eben was an excellent host, making sure to accommodate anything I could need and consistently checking in on my stay. I could not recommend staying here enough!

We had a great time on our stay! Wonderful host and such an interesting home! If walls could talk, this home would have quite the story to tell. Each room is so interesting. Even if you have to travel a few miles out of your way, this is a house you don’t want to miss!
Eben is a wonderful host! So very accommodating and responsive! Beautiful Inn perfect location.
Perfect room in a Perfect home for a weekend getaway!

If you are looking for somewhere to stay in the very cute Forest City-- this is the place! My wife and I were stunned at how unique and beautiful the building is, and the amenities set out were excellent. Eben was very quick with communication, and the Hallmark Christmas Movie-esque downtown Forest City is just a short walk away. You will truly remember your stay at this hidden gem!

My husband and I stayed here for our Wedding Anniversary weekend. We really enjoyed our stay. Mr. Eben was a great host. He personally greeted us and made sure we had everything we needed . He provided all the amenities he promised, in addition to recommendations for places we could go and visit near by. The entire place was clean and well kept. The decor was absolutely beautiful inside and out. We felt like we were staying in a small castle! Book here and and you will not be disappointed!

This was one the most incredible places I have ever stayed. The attention to detail amazing and everything in this home is one of a kind. Each room had a story and the decor is so unique. The accommodations were endless and the way Eben made us feel at home was just another perk! From the beautiful courtyard to the cozy reading nook, this place took our breath away.
Cleanliness was definitely not an issue either! My only complaint was that we couldn't stay longer. Thank you so much for such an unforgettable stay!
This place has it all charm, convenience and a delightful host!

I had very high expectations for this place and not only did the Olivewood Inn meet those expectations, it surely exceeded them! We felt like we stepped back in time - from the Italian Marble, to the iron gates in the foyer, to the beautiful and intriguing paintings throughout the whole Inn. Eben is a great host and gave us a full tour, complete with a little run down of the place itself. We haven’t been able to stop talking about it since we left - we will certainly be back as well as directing our friends there.
The bed is really comfortable. The sheets were so soft and the pillow was great!

A lovely quiet and private room in quite a fascinating old house. Microwave and mini-fridge. An attentive host who checks in with guests but also leaves them privacy. Neighborhood is quiet. Music lovers will find a library filled with books of all kinds, and the host is a musician and teacher. I highly recommend it.
Great experience

A great place to stay! Eben has an incredibly grand house that is like nothing else in the area. Room is comfortable and well furnished. 15min drive to Tryon International Equestrian Center. Would highly recommend this place to stay!

The Olivewood Inn is magical! It has so much character and historical significance. The entire house is beautiful inside and out. Eben is the perfect host. Thoughtful, punctual, helpful and friendly. A must stay if in Forest City!
it is a very nice property full of culture, very clean and centrally located
Such a quaint and cute space! Absolutely stay here if you are in the area! Eben was so kind and accommodating!
Great home and host!!

Eben is a kind and generous host with an eye for detail that makes his place is a shiny jewel in Forest City. I didn’t have a reason to go to Forest City other than wanting to stay in his gorgeous home that caught my eye while looking for places to stay in Asheville. I was happy to find out about the equestrian center nearby that hosts free sporting events occasionally, and enjoyed window shopping in downtown FC. It’s a little off the beaten path to Asheville (about an hour away), but totally worth it!
Nice bedroom. Basic stay. Some snacks available but no breakfast. Super host.
Awesome place and great location!
Great host, great location, great place! Really enjoyed my time here. Eben was super welcoming and had the place very well maintained. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
Eben is gracious, pleasant and hospitable. The facility is a well maintained and architecturally intriguing mansion - well maintained an beautiful.

My stay at the Olivewood Inn was amazing! In my opinion, it was better than staying the night in a hotel. I was so comfortable that I felt like I was staying in my own home. The house was absolutely amazing and 100% unique. I kept FaceTiming my family and friends to show how nice the house was and all the unique features it had to offer. I would definitely stay here again and would recommend this place to anyone!
I was there for a quick one night stay and didn’t spend a lot of time there, but Eben was great and the room was very comfortable.

Eben place was just wonderful combination of old world and modern amenities. It was very peaceful and we look forward to returning and seeing all his plans for this beautiful home. He kindly let us bring our fur babies and they were very happy. After a long day at the horse show the bed was so comfortable. Thanks
We had the best time. The house is amazing, and Eben is very accommodating to our requests. Would definitely come back when in the area next time.
Super cool 1920's home. Lovely space, wonderful amenities, location was perfect. Eben was a gracious host. Would be a guest here again!!!

Eben’s place was delightful, the style of the house was so beautiful and made it a fun place to stay. There is also beautiful landscaping with benches to enjoy it. Eben was prompt to communicate and accommodating the entire trip. There was even coffee, yogurt, fruit, and more each morning!

What a lovely place this was to stay for our weekend getaway from the city. Eben was responsive and pleasant. The staircase is beautiful! The room was outfitted wonderfully, and the breakfast items in the common room were appreciated. We will definitely stay there again when we are in the area.

Eben is a great host. He greeted me outside when I arrived and took the time to show me around. I typically choose to rent entire homes, but only needed a place to spend the night on this occasion. I was a little apprehensive to share a space, but found the experience at Olivewood Inn to be exceptional. The room was beautiful and the bed was very comfortable. I wish I had more time to enjoy the space. I would definitely return in the future and recommend to my friends and family.
Lovely inn convenient to everything in forest city.

Awesome place! The house itself is gorgeous. Be careful if you have Sprint, you won’t get service near the house, but the WiFi was a life saver! Awesome place, great host and AMAZING price for the place!

Beautiful and historical -- what a unique space! We stayed in the Oak Room, and the space was comfortable and had everything we needed. Check-in was easy thanks to Eben's prompt and clear communication. Would stay here again if I'm ever back in the area!

Olivewood Inn is a lovely 1920's mansion that Eben is restoring to it's original beauty and grandeur. We stayed in the Oak room which was nicely furnished and very comfortable. The shower was awesome, it was state of the art in the 20's and one of the most unique showers we've ever seen!
Restaurants and shopping are very close by which made it very convenient.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and look forward to visiting again.
The house is spectacular, with jaw dropping decor, comfortable spaces, and unique touches. We were delighted with the space.

Thanks so much for having us! The Oak Room at Olivewood Inn had everything we needed for our short stay - wish we could have enjoyed it longer! The continental breakfast area along with the mini fridge/microwave is a wonderful added benefit. Would recommend!

This is such an incredible value. The space is beautiful and so well-curated. Eben has done an excellent job of making the space welcoming and comfortable. He is very easy to communicate with. Overall, a great experience.

We had a lovely stay! Eben is very accommodating. He is quick to respond and assist you with anything you need. We will definitely be staying here again! The home is beautiful and a true gem in Forest City!

We had a wonderful experience in this unique place that offers seclusion, comfort, very fascinating interior architecture and above all a very hospitable person in Eben that runs the place. Eben went out of his way to ensure we were very comfortable and we had some great conversations with him. The small sitting room was a cozy place to hang out, have a drink/snack and catch up with reading. WiFi service was strong and consistent. About 15 minutes walk to downtown gets you to restaurants, bars and shops. Definitely worth the experience and we hope to be back soon.

A luxurious night's sleep in a quaint North Carolina town. This historic house provided all our needs from Basic Earth toiletries to coffee and muffins every morning. A unique and special experience in an historic district of Forest City.
Awesome host ! A very friendly guy and he will take care of you good and I will definitely recommend other travellers to stay at his place and have a really good experience!

Eben was a great host, attentive but unobtrusive. My travel companion and I rented both rooms, and had the entire second floor to ourselves. The house is an interesting old building, which Eben is refurbishing, and has a lot of potential. The Master Suite, in particular, with its Restoration Hardware furnishings, is very attractive. The bathrooms appear to be original to the house, and could use some updating.

Very charming home, convenient to a very quaint and historic downtown. Eben was an excellent host and was very receptive. An added plus was the ease of getting from Olivewood to Tryon International Equestrian Center. We'd love to come back when Forest City decorates for Christmas!
Awesome experience and very comfortable stay!

We stayed at The Olivewood Inn for a wedding on the area! The accommodations are absolutely stunning! Eben was very prompt and helpful at check in. The room was amazingly comfortable and super convient for our weekends festivities! The sitting room was a great place to relax! I definitely would recommend a stay at the Olivewood!

Shower-awesome.
House inside and out-awesome.
