We loved our stay at the cottage! We worked remotely from the cabin for a week and used it to do a bit of sightseeing in the mountains. The place was clean, cozy, and beautifully decorated. It was private, yet our hosts were easily reachable if needed, and it was easy to get to the store and restaurants in the area. It felt like Alex and Kimberly had thought of everything we could need.

The pictures of this cottage really don’t do it justice. It’s super cozy & cute! The accommodations were great! We loved that the place was super clean. Unfortunately when we went it was raining a lot. So, we didn’t get to make use of the fire pit or the trail they have mapped out.
We did go into Hendersonville which is a really cute town about 40 minutes away. We hiked the falls there and It was beautiful. Asheville and Charlotte we’re about an hour away as well and worth making the trip. In town where the cottage is there’s a restaurant The Copper Penny & it’s great for lunch or dinner. We had a nice time and thank you again!

If you are looking at this place stop looking and book today! We loved everything abt it! All the beautiful wildlife we saw (birds at the bird feeders outside the window, wild turkeys, blue birds, red robins, woodpecker, friendly squirrels) and made great use of the awesome fireplace which had everything you need to have a chillaxing evening! The place is immaculately clean, and beautifully decorated with all the amineties including Netflix, coffee, cozy fireplace, awesome stove and oven and huge fridge. And the shower was to die for (thats important to me). Hot water for days and great pressure, its designed so cool like your showering in a cave! All in all this place was a perfect stay for our family! And did I mention how great the hosts are?!? We hope to DEFINETLY stay again if we can find available dates. Thanks Alex and Kimberly for everything!!!
The cozy italian cottage is a lovely home, very well maintained and equipped with everything you will need to enjoy your stay. It is conveniently located for shopping and hiking.
Nice air bnb experience. We loved the outdoor fire pit, and everything was well stocked and sparkling clean inside!
Beautiful, private, quiet and the fire pit was the best! Recommend x 1000000!

The place smelled so good from the candle they had for us when we got there. They thought of all the little things. It was so clean and the fire pit was perfect. Forest City was wonderful to eat and shop around. Everything was perfect.

We loved staying at Alex and Kimberly’s cottage. They were fantastic hosts with wonderful attention to the details, had plenty of great little amenities, and it was an adorable place to stay for the month. If I could rate above 5 stars, this would be the place to do it.

Alex and Kimberly have SUCH an amazing place! I would recommend them a thousand times to anyone visiting the Asheville/Forest City area. My wife and I stayed for the weekend to do some hiking and sight seeing and this was the perfect place to come back to and unwind after a long day out. The place was incredibly clean and fully stocked with everything we needed for the weekend. The amenities were all perfect, down to the soft bed linens and bath towels! Although we didn’t get a chance to use the outside fire pit, it looked absolutely beautiful and peaceful, and we definitely plan to use it next time! They were also so quick to respond to us and even allowed a late check out (3 pm!!). Wish I could rate them 10 stars!

This cabin is such a dream! Everything was clean and organized when we arrived! We loved all the sweet surprises like canned cinnamon rolls in the fridge and popsicles in the freezer! My husband and I got to take advantage of the fire pit which was really romantic with the hanging lights. Not only was the cabin absolutely lovely, the hosts were amazing as well! They provided easy instructions on how to get there and how to access the cabin. They were always available and very helpful! Our family didn’t want to leave! I would highly recommend this cabin if you are wanting to stay in Forest City!

I have stayed here several times!!! The comfort, coziness, and beauty of this cottage is amazing. The hosts are super quick to respond. The area is safe and just an experience if u are in the area to try! The price is super reasonable. I HIGHLY recommend this Italian Cottage!
Great little gem! Close to TIEC.

Great property located in a fantastic quite location yet close enough to downtown Forest City and other venues. Super clean and modern, great value, well thought out cabin. Very impressive. Thanks Kimberly and Alex for a great stay. Tony
All around excellent experience, and great host made us feel at home. Thank you Alex and Kimberly!

Absolutely great place. The cabin is wonderful, everything is there- just enjoy. Great trail to take our little dog for walks. Quick response to any request. Sparkling clean and very pretty. Actually a very good getaway for a romantic trip! The special touches were very much appreciated. Highly, highly recommended.

This cottage is absolutely lovely. It’s tucked away and offers a sweet escape in nature without being in the middle of nowhere. My husband and I stayed for the weekend while in town for a wedding and I couldn’t think of a more perfect getaway between all the wedding festivities. I also highly recommend drinking your morning coffee out on the front porch. We would definitely book a stay here again!

Beautiful clean cottage, we enjoyed our stay everything was perfectly organized and well thought. We will be back! The area is great with good restaurants close to everything you need. We went on few hikes and waterfall viewing such a great time!

Being in the middle of a pandemic, during an extremely hot spell, on the weekend of the July 4th, left us somewhat limited in things to do-like fly to Europe...thank the higher powers that we found our little Italian cottage and it was so incredibly perfect! Every detail was on point.
Imagine entering into a cool candlelit wonderland where the decor is so soft and inviting--the lighting, the paint job, the tiling, the furnishing--complete with a little loaf of baked 'goodness' ...everything in its place and [they allow dogs but is so immaculately clean you would never know it]. The bathroom is bright and full of wonderful smelling lotions and soaps, and plenty of fluffy towels. The bedroom has a huge bed, covered in pillows and extra blankets in every closet, with plenty of space to put your things. The living area is small but more than adequate. Besides, the kitchen is place to be when you're not on the front porch or around the area.
Then there's the firepit with the adjustable mood light surrounded with the mini roses and gardenias and peonies! Stunning!
And the service! We received an answer to any questions we had within minutes, complete with a list of restaurants and the distance to them. In fact, the day prior to arrival we inquired as to whether or not there was a grill--there definitely was one when we got there-brand new with all the utensils you would need...that's going the extra step, which is why they are truly super hosts.
I strongly recommend this property. It was the perfect spot for a nice, quiet, delightful getaway.
By the way, there are plenty of trails for hiking, waterfalls, and things to do in the area[check out the equestrian center!]--and even though a lot of the restaurants weren't open due to the aforementioned reasons, we ate very well!!
I think Italy would be proud. Well done and Thank you! We truly enjoyed it!

This was my first time using an Airbnb and I’m so happy that I chose this one! This place was very comfortable and very relaxing environment. Everything that I needed was supplied by Alex and Kimberly for ex, washer/dryer w laundry detergent, coffee, Netflix/satellite tv/internet are just a few to name; they were very thoughtful and gave me complimentary baked bread & drinks. If you are looking for a place to get away/relax and enjoy nature then don’t look any further and book your stay here...you will love it! I enjoyed my 3 day stay and look forward to returning. Thanks again, Alex and Kimberly for everything.

Alex and Kimberly were fantastic hosts. The cabin was beyond my expectations, plus very, very clean. Great place to relax and feel pampered by your surroundings. Wish we could have stayed longer. This cabin was well appointed and very cozy.
The cabin was wonderful. Clean, well decorated, comfortable bed and quiet peaceful location. Great place to unwind after business all day.

The cottage was sparkling clean and had all the amenities you could ask for. Alex and Kimberly were even thoughtful enough to provide our lab with a treat upon our arrival. We will definitely be back to stay!

Alex and Kimberly’s place was amazing. It was clean and quiet which is perfect if you’re a traveling professional working a night shift! Having a trail in the back was also a huge plus if you are traveling with a dog, which I was. Everything I could ever need and want was already on site and the location was great. All in all I highly recommend, you can’t go wrong staying at Alex and Kimberly’s cottage.

This house is a wonderfully decorated place with all the amenities. It is a great location if you are going to Tryon Equestrian Center, Fence, or Windridge. We will stay here again and again. I highly recommend it!

Alex and Kim’s place is wonderful! The pics are accurate, the space it clean and modern and very cozy. The hosts are quite thoughtful and intentional about the details and amenities of there place. Would definitely stay again!

This is my 3rd or 4th visit to the cottage!!! Alex and Kim are Super Duper Hosts! This is the most stylish, quiet and comfortable Air BnB you could possibly visit. The decorations are beautiful, the amenities are above bountiful, the welcoming into the cottage by special touches are so heartfelt. This location is wooded, safe and very reasonable for the top quality property they host! If you are in this area... THIS IS YOUR Air BnB!!!!!! They do NOT disappoint!
They’ve put a lot of effort into the house and it shows!!
I travel here for work regularly. This stay was just as great as all the previous stays. Thanks!
Great Place !! Ingles 2 minutes away! Perfect size for a girls get away toward mountains. Loved the Shower!! Would definitely stay again .
Loved everything about the cottage. We felt right at home. Perfect place for a weekend away !!
Really nice cottage, comfortable bed, and within 5 minutes of all the Forest City restaurants
Amazing
I love this cozy cabin! Clean, loaded with amenities, country setting but yet convenient, safe and sooooo comfortable! If you r near the area I highly suggest this Air BnB!

This place was absolutely amazing!! The location was great, amenities top-notch and hosts were very accommodating. It was the perfect getaway for my husband and I and we will definitely be back for a longer stay!

Absolutely my favorite Airbnb experience! Charming little cottage that is cozy, extremely clean, high quality craftsmanship, tasteful decor, lots of special touches, and had everything we needed. Although I read a ton of the great reviews and loved the pictures, it was still better than I expected. The hosts are friendly and quick to respond. We live in nearby Asheville, but were spending a kid free weekend celebrating our anniversary. So many fun things to explore in the area, not only Forest City (which indeed has a charming downtown...and fried pickles at the Copper Penny YUM!), there is also a wonderful winery nearby in Tryon, Mountain Brook Vineyards, a great place to hangout with great views and delightful atmosphere and enjoyed relaxing live music. Also, cute town of Rutherfordton ( bought great priced pottery at shop community art shop downtown, coffee at Small Town Coffee Roasters and ate lunch at the Garden Cafe in Rutherfordton hosts recommended and loved it, my husband said it was best clam chowder he ever had) and so many other great towns to explore and not far from Asheville. I don't usually write epic reviews, but so many good things to say about the experience :)

This is the perfect place for 1-2 travelers. It was perfectly appointed with nice touches, such as fresh cut flowers, amenities and thoughtfulness into what a guest may need. Even our two Boston Terriers enjoyed this lovely airbnb. I highly recommend Alex and Kimberly's accommodations. We'd definitely stay here again.

Alex and Kimberly’s Airbnb was absolutely perfect. The space was quiet, clean, and quite peaceful. They were very quick to respond when we had questions. They left sweet little touches such as fresh cut flowers that put a smile on our faces. We were visiting their area for a 31 mile Spartan race and needed some extra rest. They accommodated us with a later check out time that was extremely helpful (we were moving slowly). Overall, our stay was wonderful. We will definitely stay with them next time we are in the area.

We have stayed twice at Alex and Kimberlys place. Both times were great with super clean cottages and thoughtful touches throughout the home. We travel with our dogs and I love that they have a dog bed for our old girl. They also leave out dog bowls which is something we ALWAYS forget to pack. Wonderful place all the way around.
This was the cutest and most comfortable space to spend the weekend in. Alex & Kimberly were amazing host. The place felt just like home. Definitely would recommend for a couple get away.

Alex and Kimberly’s cottage was the perfect home base for my family when we spent a weekend visiting friends in Forest City! The furnishings are stylish and comfortable, and the space was clean and inviting. We will definitely stay again!

My second Visit to Alex and Kimberly’s and it was as amazing as the first. The place is so clean you could eat from the floor. Beautifully decorated, back off of the road a little but just enough to seem like heaven. They fire pit is wonderful! Comfy beds and FULLY LOADED with whatever u may need, even a luscious snack or two or three! This is my place when I visit Gaffney! If you like serene country but eateries etc within driving distance this is your place! Fantastic communication and their property makes me feel like I am home! Great value, superb property and safe as safe can be!!! Thank you Kimberly and Alex!!!!
Quiet lovely spot.

We had a perfect weekend at the cottage!! The thoughtful touches greeting us from fresh flowers, a delicious cinnamon bun, fresh coffee beans, and even a treat for our pup made this spot feel like a home away from home. The cottage was spotless, the king bed was comfy, and the kitchen was well stocked for any cooking utensils you may need. The fire pit was a huge plus!! Don’t hesitate to book this place - we look forward to returning for future smores around the fire and mornings spent on the porch drinking coffee. A++!

A beautiful little cottage tucked into a quiet neighborhood. Kimberly will have the place pristine for you along with a special tasty muffin from the local bakery. Fresh flowers adorn the table to make it feel like home. Motorcyclists be aware that the driveways are all gravel as well as the parking areas. Other than that, book your stay!! Hurry now before it’s all booked up!

If anyone is wondering whether or not they should book Alex and Kimberly's cottage, the answer is a definite yes! This was my first stay at an Airbnb, and I have to say that they really set the bar as hosts. I had no idea that a small cottage could be so luxurious. The best way to describe it would be "well appointed." Their taste in design and quality of craftsmanship is impeccable! Everything from the floor to the ceiling was beautiful, comfortable, welcoming, and remarkably clean. The hosts really went above and beyond to provide a home away from home - when we arrived, we were greeted with a fresh pastry, local coffee beans and ground coffee, a stocked Keurig machine, farm fresh eggs, bottled water, and even dairy free creamer and condiments in the refrigerator. The bathroom and shower was an absolutely gorgeous mini-sanctuary, with the necessary toiletries provided in case you forgot something. The king sized bed was clean and comfortable, with ample pillows and blankets to adjust to your liking, and even some books to clear your mind and relax with. We enjoyed browsing the channels on Direct TV and the WiFi worked like a charm. Communication with Kimberly was a breeze, as was the check-in and check-out procedures. I plan on returning to this cottage many times in the future. It was a fantastic experience that I highly recommend to any Airbnb guest.

First off, they only give me 5 stars and I need MORE! This cottage is absolutely PERFECT! As a traveling nurse I stay alone much of the time. The area is so safe and quiet. Don’t let the beautiful woods scare you off if u are going to stay alone!!!! This area and location is VERY SAFE!!!! I arrived to fresh flowers in vases and the sunflowers 🌻 are my absolute favorite flower and it made me smile. They left a wonderful pastry, coffee, water and some other items. It felt just like home!!! Wi-Fi was strong as I use it to work after I leave work. The couch and bed were superbly comfortable. The linens on the bed, blankets, towels and wash clothes were top notch!!! The bathroom and shower had some serious thought. It was fully stocked and I loved it!!! I loved the desk to work on and there was even a printer I could connect to as well! Full service TV, Netflix etc. The couch pulls out as a bed if needed and high class sheets and blankets are available if u need to use it. The kitchen was LOADED with anything and everything you could imagine to cook! The spice rack was phenomenal. The setting of this cabin back off the road had tons of privacy. I enjoyed turning the lights on and sitting outside in the gorgeous Adirondack seats! There is firewood etc to have a fire and all of this is provided at a cost I felt too good to be true. So if u r traveling or just want to get away, I HIGHLY recommend Alex and Kimberly’s property. I certainly intend on staying again when work sends me to Gaffney!
It’s gonna take something super special to top this rental!!!!! I was so excited when I left work to get back to the cottage as quick as I could and was sad to have to say good bye this morning.
Thank you so much for accepting my request for reservations!

This cottage provides a wonderful surprise when you walk in the door. The host has taken a lot of time setting the place up for their guests. The cottage is welcoming and so comfy! No reason to leave the cottage except to enjoy the open fire pit outdoors. Will definitely stay here again when in the area.
Great spot, would go back!
Best Air BnB I have ever experienced. Beautiful, clean, and cozy with all the little extra touches; and they even welcomed our dogs with a bed, bowls and treats, so special!!
Beautiful cabin with thoughtful touches. Host is super responsive. Would highly recommend!

Alex and Kimberly were amazing host. They made it easy and convenient. Great location and space. Tours available in the area with amazing views and waterfalls. It was extremely clean and cozy. Highly recommend this beautiful cottage!
This cabin is gorgeous. The location is great. It’s literally like vacationing in a smaller version of our own home.

Wow this place was excellent. It was clean, beautiful love all of the decor. Perfect place to stay you are close to alot of beautiful places like Chimney Rock, Lake Lure and walking trails, waterfalls. Even my dogs loved it they got alot of love from Kimberly. I will definitely come and stay again. Alex and Kimberly are the perfect hosts!
Wonderful experience, more beautiful in person, clean, peaceful, accommodating, wish we could’ve stayed longer. Will definitely use this air bnb again.
This was an AMAZING stay!! The hosts went above and beyond providing thoughtful touches and amenities. Loved the fire pit and king sized bed.

Driving 10 plus hours your final place to rest your head is key. I cannot say enough how much we loved our stay. Great place, would 1,000% recommend the stay here. We would definitely stay here again without any hesitation
I almost don’t want to say how great this place was since I will be coming back often. Great space and beautiful amenities. Just awesome!
Wonderful place to stay! Great location and fabulous host. We loved the small details that Alex and Kimberly added to the cottage to make it feel warm and cozy and welcoming.

What a wonderful cabin! I travel to the area for work frequently and decided to skip the hotel this time and try something new. I am so glad I did!
The cabin is very warm and cozy, and it was immaculately clean when I arrived. There were even fresh flowers when I arrived. The bed was very comfortable too. I hope to be back soon!

This space was beautiful and immaculate, and the hosts seem to have thought of everything. So many thoughtful details, from the labeled light switches to the ample closet storage to the best slice of pie I’ve ever tasted. It was an absolutely lovely retreat, and they accommodated me very last minute as well. Stay here if you are in the area. Best Airbnb experience ever.

I’ll keep this simple...if you’re staying in Forest City, Shelby, or the nearby area, STAY HERE.
Best amenities. Cleanest Air B&B I have ever stayed at. These folks run a professional and luxurious operation.
Seriously, this place is unreal.

This place is darling. Very well designed space, in fact I might steal it and build one! I had a fairly short notice booking and the hosts were not just responsive, but had fresh bread, honey and local coffee for us. AND fresh flowers. Those things made even a more welcoming space. You will not be disappointed!

You will not be disappointed!
What an interesting cottage Alex and Kimberly have created. The cottage is tastefully decorated and thanks to all the personal touches has a feeling of “home” when you first open the door.
Attention to the small details can make or break a getaway. The hosts have thought of it all. This cottage has everything you will need to make your stay enjoyable and relaxing.
There are only two things you need to bring with you; clothes and if you plan on cooking, food. Honestly the hosts have thought of it all. We thought we would need to take a trip to the local store to grab a few essentials but never had to set foot into a store.
If you love the outdoors, the area has so much to offer all within a hour or less drive. If you’re coming to relax, the outdoors fire pit is impressive.
You will not be disappointed in your decision to book this place.

This was our best airbnb experience yet! This beautiful cabin was absolutely spotless and filled with great amenities and every little thing you could possibly need! They left us cute little touches like dog treats and baked goods. We had such a relaxing stay and definitely would like to come back. Alex and Kimberly responded quickly and were available for anything we might need.

This is truly an amazing place! It looks great in pictures, and even better in person. Impeccable quality, easy comfort, and a full set of amenities (perfect kitchen set up and appliances) made this an extremely great place to stay! Very impressive that you can find this kind of living space in the quietness of the trees and mountains.
Pretty easy to get to and a grocery store close by, it’s a great relaxing getaway. When I arrived there was a sweet bread from a local bakery, fresh coffee beans (along with a coffee grinder and French press), and even a treat for my dog! Extremely clean and well taken care of. Would definitely stay here again.
This place is sparkling clean & decorated with great taste! I highly recommend it.

We rented this as a gift to my sister and her husband for their anniversary and this is what they said: "This place is absolutely perfect in every way! I love the ambiance, so relaxing! The host is an adorable couple that are super helpful and friendly and were easy to communicate with, but they also gave us our privacy. They went out of their way to make our stay special, and it truly was. We loved everything about it! Can't wait to stay here again! "

This is one of my favorite places to stay. My wife and I love all the little touches in the house and the true cottage feel you get in this very quiet and beautiful area. They even make sure your puppy is provided with all they need to be happy. The hosts go above and beyond to make sure your accommodated in every way you will need. If your ever in this part of the world make sure you stay in the Italian cottage.... you will not regret it!!

Absolutely one of our favorite Airbnb stays ever! This was a 4-day recharge getaway for my husband and I and our 2 little dogs. Kimberly and Alex have created such a special little cabin and really know how to roll out the red carpet.
They thought of everything from an easy check-in, to a bed and dishes for the dogs, to all the dish ware you could possibly need! There were little magical touches here and there including a loaf of sweet potato bread that was to die for!
Alex and Kimberly are very responsive and check-in was a breeze.
It was such a pleasure to meet Kimberly, and also her father in-law! For sure ask him what he does for a living. Impressive.
Our dogs loved the walking trail in the woods! We loved the holiday festivities in Forest City! Mostly, though, we loved hanging out in the darling cottage, reading, napping and being together unplugged. (There is WiFi, we just chose not to use it, and an impressive selection of TV channels.)
None of us wanted to leave, and we will surely be back! Thank you Alex and Kimberly for your warm hospitality.
Everything about this place was great!!!
Great place! Super clean! Love, Love the place!

Alex and Kimberly were simply amazing hosts. This house was more than we expected. Kimberly and Alex left us some amazing sweet potato pecan bread, wine, and a sweet note because we were celebrating our anniversary. The home was spacious for my husband and I and our stay. The fire pit was such a nice touch and we throughly enjoyed all the amenities.

Wow! Best place we’ve stayed in so far. Beautiful space and lovely extra touches. Appreciated the key pad as we came into town really late. Really wish we had the time to use the outdoor fire pit as it looked amazing. We were really worried about our 20 month old ruining the beautiful space but he had fun running around the outside and we put his travel crib in the little office so he could sleep without distractions. We will definitely recommend to others and come back the next time we are in the area.

We rented this place for our weekend trip to Asheville and were more than pleased with the home. Everything was sparkling clean and the hosts even added extra touches such as keurig cups, extra towels, and small hygiene items. They were very communicative and answered any questions we had as well as made sure we had a comfortable stay. The best part of all was the hospitality. We exchanged stories beside the fire pit and enjoyed their company as well as their stories. They are probably some of the nicest and most sincere people I have ever met in my life to be honest. This place is definitely super clean, very comfortable, and has amazing hosts. I would stay here again in a heartbeat! If you’ve read the review this far down just save yourself some time and go ahead and book this place. You will not be disappointed I promise.

Airbnb have a gem with Kimberly and Alex as hosts with the program. My daughter and I spent the weekend in this beautiful 1 bedroom cottage and we are already trying to figure out when we can go back for another visit. The location could not have been better for our needs; so quiet. It is very well appointed with everything you could possibly need.
Kimberly and Alex go out of their way to make your stay enjoyable and memorable. Do yourself a favor and make a trip to the Foothills of NC and stay at this adorable cottage. You can get anywhere you need to go in minutes.
Nice house!
Beautiful, clean and cozy home. Great for family vacations.
Great stay for our crew while they work on NCDOT mowing in the area.

Place was exactly as advertised. House was just like a house with everything available. Only upgrade would be some softer mattresses. But they were still fine to sleep on. Host was very good at getting back to us quickly. Highly recommend this host and house.

we had a good stay while racing at Shadyside dragway and the grocery store is super close to the house

Could have been cleaner. Would have been nice to have a few more amenities- kitchen items, etc.

Great stay!

would use for sure

Great place nice and big great tvs large kitchen just a super nice place that we will be back to! She helped us out in a bind and I highly appreciate it and recommend her place!
Cristys place was very clean, all the rooms were spacious and there was plenty of parking. Easy to find and close to everything you would need. Very attentive hosts. We’ll definitely book again.
Great place. No complaints.
Great deal. Nice big home, plenty of room, beds and big kitchen. New appliances. This was a great place to stay. Will definitely ask again when we’re back.
Cute little house! Plenty of room for a decent size group.
super clean & excellent communication!

We enjoyed our stay in the home! We liked the rustic feel with the tin roof above the cupboards in the kitchen.
One thing we hope has been updated on the website is the picture of the one bedroom. It showed a double bed and a bunk bed. However, it only had a double bed, which was disappointing for our son who picked the bunk bed before leaving on our trip.

Excellent location, enjoyed morning walks to the Starbucks in the nearby Ingles. Quiet neighborhood, nice kitchen amenities, and space for our group to relax. Fell in love with Forest City. Clean and restful place to stay.
Good value, clean and cool. Close to everything and easy to get to.

Lots of space and sleeping areas on one floor. The kitchen is fully stocked for anyone who likes to cook their meals and the appliances are all nice. The house/neighborhood aren’t fancy but it’s a quiet area close to Ingles grocery, which has a cafe and Starbucks inside. You could walk (probably 30 mins), bike, or drive (less than 5 mins away). The hosts are responsive and friendly.

The house is so well built and the suites are private, cozy and super clean. We had an incredible time, the grounds are clean and well kept. Everything is so lush and green. I will definitely return in the future.

My family and I rented the tin roof for two days during the 4th of July week. It was centrally located between Shelby (our hometown) and Chimney Rock/Lake Lure, NC which is where we did a lot of our memory making. The tin roof gave us all the comforts of home and then some. You will not be disappointed!
Our stay was wonderful
Good location a lot of space for a lot of people and communication is very excellent
Conveniently located and everything we needed for our stay. Would stay again!

The location of this house was perfect for our weekend in Forest City for a music festival. Our family enjoyed the quiet neighborhood and the closeness to the POPS Park for the festival. Great family time together at Cristy's house.
Great place as always. The crew and I have stayed here multiple times. Thank you Cristy.

Really nice and well kept place to stay. It can accommodate 4+ people very well. If in the area, this is the one!
